ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Unable to build Heritrix by maven
ygData.msgSnippet: Check the tests that failed. Could they be failing because you are running on windows -- Heritrix is not officially supported on windows -- or perhaps

Check the tests that failed. Could they be failing because you are
running on windows -- Heritrix is not 'officially' supported on windows
-- or perhaps because they are making presumption about the
locale/native-encoding that do not hold on your (Chinese?) system.

St.Ack



Carolyn wrote:
>
> Hello,
> I have a problem: I failed to build Heritrix by maven.
> Heritrix(selftest) can run successfully in ecilpse, but maven failed
> to build the project. There are several junit testcases failed, and
> though "target/distributions" and "target/generated-xdocs" are
> created, nothing is generated in them.
> I think I may have made some mistakes for the configuration of
> Heritrix or Maven, maybe you can help me to find solutions to the
> problem. Thanks so much.
